description.jp: かつて世界を救い バロン王国の国王となったセシルと王妃ローザの間に生まれた王子。偉大な両親を持ってしまったために周囲から寄せられる過度な期待に思い悩んでいたが 数々の困難を乗り越え成長していく。
description.gl: Prince born to the heroes King Cecil and Queen Rosa of Baron. Though troubled by the expectations thrust upon him due to his extraordinary parentage, by overcoming numerous trials he would come into his own.

jp.text: ぼくは…\n自分の力で進みたいんだ…！！
あなたは…\nなぜ そうまでしてぼくを…？
取り戻さないと…父さんを…！
ぼくは父さんと母さんの子ですから！
また会えます！\nいつか また…！

gl.text: Tell me、 why are you doing all this for me?
I've got to get my father back...no matter what the cost!
Without my mother and father、 I am nothing.
No training wheels this time、 I hope.
May we meet again! Someday、 somewhere!

name.gl: コールアビリティ_セオドア
name.jp: コールアビリティ_セオドア

rank_up_desc.en:
When using [Saint Blast (C)]
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
• Increases HP damage dealt to non-targets by 30%
• [Holy Wedge] duration +2
rank_up_desc.gl:
When using Saint's Blast (C):
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Slightly increased HP damage to non-targets
 • Holy Lynchpin duration +2
rank_up_desc.jp:
「セイントブラスト【C】」使用時
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
・ターゲット以外に与えるHPダメージ小アップ
・「聖なる楔」の2ACTION期間延長

name.gl: LDコールアビリティ_セオドア
name.jp: LDコールアビリティ_セオドア

rank_up_desc.en:
When using [Divine Heal (C)]
• Increases BRV gain based on current HP by 20%
• Becomes 4-HIT AoE Holy ranged BRV attack + AoE HP attack
　+ 6-HIT AoE Holy ranged BRV attack + AoE HP attack
• Increases total BRV potency by 80%
• Gained BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 200% Max BRV
rank_up_desc.gl:
When using Divine Heal (C):
 • Slight boost to BRV granted based on current HP
 • 8-hit group Holy  ranged BRV  attack + group HP  attack becomes 4-hit group Holy  ranged BRV  attack + group HP  attack + 6-hit group Holy  ranged BRV  attack + group HP  attack; tremendously increased BRV damage
 • Increased BRV may exceed individual MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 200%
rank_up_desc.jp:
「ディバインヒール【C】」使用時
・現在HP依存のBRV加算量小アップ
・8HIT聖属性全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃が
　4HIT聖属性全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
　＋6HIT聖属性全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃に変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・加算したBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限はそれぞれの最大BRVの150％分
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの200％分

name.jp: かくせい

desc.en:
Self: removes all debuffs
Recovers 100% of own HP
Increases own BRV by 50% Current HP
Self: 2 turns Special Effect [Awakening]

While [Awakening] is active
• Raises Max BRV, ATK by 40%
• Raises Max HP by 30%
• Increases stolen BRV overflow limit by 30%
* Consumes 80% of own HP upon expiration
desc.gl:
Removes all debuffs from self
Tremendously restores own HP
Increases BRV based on current HP
Self: 2 turns special effect Awaken

While special effect Awaken active:
 • Moderately raises own MAX BRV, ATK
 • Slightly raises own MAX HP
 • Slightly increases amount stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV
 • Largely consumes own HP when special effect Awaken canceled
desc.jp:
自身の弱体効果を全て回復＋自身のHPを極大回復し
自身に自身の現在HPに依存した量のBRVを加算
自身に2ACTION特殊効果 「かくせい」付与
特殊効果「かくせい」付与中
自身の最大BRVと攻撃力中アップ
最大HPと奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する上限が小アップ
特殊効果「かくせい」解除時 自身のHPを大消費

name.jp: バイブレイ・セカンド

desc.en:
4-HIT AoE Holy melee BRV attack + AoE HP attack
Increases BRV damage dealt by 60% when attacking single target
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
Deals split HP damage between all targets

While [Awakening] is active and when party's HP is at least 100% of MAX
• [Vibra Plus] becomes [Vibra Plus+]
　∟ 4-HIT AoE Holy melee BRV attack + AoE HP attack delivered twice (50% per hit)
　∟ Increases BRV damage dealt by 60% when attacking single target
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Deals split HP damage between all targets
desc.gl:
4-hit group Holy melee BRV attack + group HP attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target

While special effect Awaken active and party HP at least 100%:
 • Becomes Vibra Plus+
desc.jp:
4HIT聖属性全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
攻撃対象が単体の時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
与えるHPダメージは分配
特殊効果「かくせい」付与中
かつ 味方全員のHPが最大HPの100％以上の時
「バイブレイ・セカンド＋」に変化

• Raises Max BRV by 50%, Attack by 55%
• Self: [Awakening]
• Party: removes all debuffs
• Recovers party's HP by 80% of individual MAX HP
• Increases party's BRV by 30% of own current HP
• 8-HIT AoE Holy ranged BRV attack + AoE HP attack

While [Awakening] is active
• Raises Max BRV, ATK by 40%
• Raises Max HP by 30%
• Increases stolen BRV overflow limit by 30%
* Consumes 80% of own HP upon expiration

desc.en:
[Saint Blast] use +3

When using [Saint Blast]
• BRV attack hit count becomes 6
• Increases total BRV potency by 150%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
• Increases HP damage dealt to non-targets by 30%

While [Red Wings] is active
• [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+]
　∟ AoE Holy melee BRV attack (BRV potency 80%)
　∟ Increases BRV damage dealt by 60% when attacking single target
　∟ Recovers party's HP by 50% BRV damage dealt (limit 10% of MAX HP)
　∟ Increases party's BRV by 50% of own current HP
• [HP Attack] becomes [HP Attack+]
　∟ Holy melee BRV attack + HP attack (BRV potency 90%)
　∟ Increases allies' BRV by 50% of HP damage dealt
desc.gl:
Saint's Blast use +3

When using Saint's Blast:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 6; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Slightly increased HP damage to non-targets

While Red Wings active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (group Holy melee BRV attack; moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target; moderately restores party's HP based on BRV damage dealt; recovery limit: 10% of individual MAX HP; grants party BRV based on own current HP)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (Holy melee BRV attack + HP attack; grants allies BRV based on HP damage dealt)

desc.en:
When using [Vibra Plus]
• Becomes 4-HIT AoE Holy melee BRV attack + HP attack delivered twice
• Increases total BRV potency by 60%

When using [Vibra Plus+]
• Becomes 6-HIT AoE Holy melee BRV attack + HP attack delivered three times
• Increases total BRV potency by 300%

While [Red Wings] is active
• [BRV Attack] variants become [BRV Attack++]
　∟ 2-HIT AoE Holy melee BRV attack (45% per hit)
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Recovers party's HP by 50% BRV damage dealt (limit 10% of MAX HP)
　∟ Increase party's BRV by 50% own current HP
　∟ Gained BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
• [HP Attack] variants become [HP Attack++]
　∟ 2-HIT Holy melee BRV attack + HP attack (60% per hit)
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Increases allies' BRV by 50% HP damage dealt

While [Awakening] is active
• [BRV Attack] variants become [BRV Attack++ (Awakening)]
　∟ 5-HIT AoE Holy melee BRV attack + ST HP attack (50% per hit)
　∟ Increases BRV damage dealt by 60% when attacking single target
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
　∟ Increases own BRV by 20% of HP damage dealt
• [HP Attack] variants become [HP Attack++ (Awakening)]
　∟ 6-HIT Holy melee BRV attack + HP attack (50% per hit)
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
desc.gl:
When using Vibra Plus:
 • 6-hit group Holy melee BRV attack + group HP attack becomes 4-hit group Holy melee BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 2 times; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage

When using Vibra Plus+:
 • 6-hit group Holy melee BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 2 times becomes 6-hit group Holy melee BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 3 times; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage

While Red Wings active:
 • BRV Attack, BRV Attack+ becomes BRV Attack++ (2-hit group Holy melee BRV attack; moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; moderately restores party's HP based on BRV damage dealt; recovery limit: 10% of individual MAX HP; grants party BRV based on own current HP; increased BRV may exceed individual MAX BRV up to 120%)
 • HP Attack, HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (2-hit Holy melee BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; grants allies BRV based on HP damage dealt)

While special effect Awaken active:
 • BRV Attack, BRV Attack+, BRV Attack++, BRV Attack+ (Awaken) becomes BRV Attack++ (Awaken) (5-hit group Holy melee BRV attack + single-target HP attack; moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%; increases BRV by 20% of HP damage dealt)
 • HP Attack, HP Attack+, HP Attack++, HP Attack+ (Awaken) becomes HP Attack++ (Awaken) (6-hit Holy melee BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; deals 50% HP damage to non-targets)
